Possibility","consider-as-h1[]":["Yes"],"snippet-description":"

Set within a serene 15-acre park-like landscape just minutes from Columbus’s premier shopping, dining, and entertainment, The Ohioan Hotel & Event Center is an upscale boutique destination designed to elevate every gathering. Whether you're convening for education, inspiration, motivation, or strategic planning, our versatile spaces and thoughtful amenities create the ideal environment for meaningful connection and impactful outcomes. 

","snippet-description-more":"

From a full-service Ohio convention center to a conference dining room featuring award-winning cuisine, our property offers everything in one place: a refined boutique hotel, a welcoming pub, distinctive recreation and entertainment options, tranquil courtyards, poolside patios, and service that anticipates your every need. Whether you're hosting a leadership retreat, team-building workshop, training seminar, or planning session, The Ohioan is where ideas flourish and teams thrive.

The Ohioan Hotel & Event Center sets the standard for romantic wedding venues in Columbus, Ohio. Our venue’s retreat-like setting near the intersection of Route 23 and Polaris Parkway provides event spaces with endless possibilities and stunning indoor and outdoor locations that beg to be photographed.

","snippet-description-more":"

Our property is perfectly appointed to help create your perfect day. Our beautiful, flexible wedding venue in Columbus, Ohio, lets each couple find the ideal space to suit their needs and unique tastes. Our hotel is centrally located, with upscale, boutique accommodations. Our cozy on-site pub is a great place for social gatherings before and after the festivities.

At the Ohioan, we are honored to specialize in award-winning dining and luxurious overnight accommodations. We know that an impeccable property just wouldn’t be complete without extraordinary service. Host your wedding reception in Columbus, Ohio, at The Ohoian, and our team will be sure to delight your guests in every detail. This is your day – we’ll make sure it’s one to remember.

Demopoulos Senior Business Development Manager","snippet-tagline":"Senior Business Development Manager","snippet-title":"Lindsey Demopoulos","consider-as-h1[]":[""],"snippet-description":"

Lindsey Demopoulos is a seasoned professional with over nine years of experience in the events and wedding industry. Having lived her entire life in Ohio, Lindsey has deep roots in the community and a profound appreciation for the charm and traditions of the region. Her passion lies in helping couples bring their unique wedding day visions to life, ensuring that every detail reflects their love story.  In her free time, Lindsey cherishes spending time with her family. She enjoys life’s simple joys alongside her husband, young daughter, and two dogs. Lindsey’s dedication to her clients, combined with her creativity and attention to detail, makes her a trusted partner in planning one of life’s most memorable milestones.  Lindsey can’t wait to work with you to create a wedding day that is as beautiful and unique as you!
